Content: Not all FTL-methods should adhere to the cluster connection points.
Wormholes for example should be distributed more ''randomly'' (having
them at a easier to defend outer position for the cluster would not be
terrible though). (The better solution is probably to have certain
FTL-line-bound-media be more ''real-space'' like and always connect to
outer systems and other tend to different systems (for examle the
